name: portofolio-site
description: Portfolio site using Vite, TailwindCSS, and Node.js with TypeScript server.

scripts.backend:prod: npm install --prefix server && npm run build --prefix server
scripts.frontend:prod: npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run frontend:dev" "npm run tailwind" "npm run backend:dev"
scripts.build: npm run backend:prod && npm run tailwind && npm run frontend:prod
